name: Weekend Fashion Saloon – Girl dress up stylist boutique and star makeover salon game
name_original: Weekend Fashion Saloon – Girl dress up stylist boutique and star makeover salon game
description:
Hey girls and kids! Welcome to the “Weekend Fashion Saloon”. Dress up the princess characters according to the up to date fashion trends. Select the clothes and shoes of your choice from the vast variety available. Dress up the girls like real princess and also capture their photos from the studio. Isn’t it fun? So download it now for free and enjoy!

HOW TO PLAY:
======================
• Select the stage you want to enter
• Dress up the princess girl with the fashionable clothes and shoes
• Capture the photographs from the studio
• Share it with your friends and family on facebook

FEATURES:
======================
• Easy tap and drag game play.
• Kids friendly content
• Backgrounds and wallpaper personalization
• Suitable for the whole family
• Cool BG music and HD graphics

=== YOU ARE SWEET ===
Your support by good reviews and ratings would help us to always provide you with free and cool apps and games; so don’t hesitate to give good ratings and reviews. We always welcome your feedback and any cool ideas about our games, to improve continuously; you might be willing to share at playinkstudio@gmail.com

=== JOIN US ON FACEBOOK ===
There are some exclusive news, updates and secret tips and tricks for you about our games at facebook,

OK then enjoy & Good Bye!
